description: This file provides utility functions for generating collision-resistant IDs for notes, primarily by combining timestamps with random strings. It includes a function to generate a random string using crypto capabilities when available, and falls back to Math.random if necessary. The main exported function creates a note ID with a specified prefix, timestamp, and random component.

methods.name: randomString(bytes = 8)
methods.description: Generates a base36-encoded random string using crypto if available, otherwise falls back to concatenated Math.random outputs.

methods.name: generateNoteId(prefix = 'note')
methods.description: Creates a collision-resistant note ID consisting of a prefix, current timestamp, and a random string.
